026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets;
027
028import java.util.EnumSet;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Optional;
031
032import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
033import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
034import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
035
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.BaseConfiguration;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Messages;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.CommentHelper;
040import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFinder;
041import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.Utils;
042import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFinder.Result;
043
044import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
045import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location;
046
047/**
048 * A taglet that represents the {@code {@inheritDoc}} tag.
049 */
050public class InheritDocTaglet extends BaseTaglet {
051
052    /**
053     * Construct a new InheritDocTaglet.
054     */
055    public InheritDocTaglet() {
056        super(DocTree.Kind.INHERIT_DOC, true, EnumSet.of(Location.METHOD));
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Given an element and {@code @inheritDoc} tag in that element's doc comment,
061     * returns the (recursive) expansion of that tag.
062     *
063     * <p>This method does not expand all {@code {@inheritDoc}} tags in the given
064     * element's doc comment. To do this, the method must be called for every
065     * such tag.</p>
066     *
067     * @param writer the writer that is writing the output.
068     * @param method the method that we are documenting.
069     * @param inheritDoc the {@code {@inheritDoc}} tag
070     * @param isFirstSentence true if we only want to inherit the first sentence
071     */
072    private Content retrieveInheritedDocumentation(TagletWriter writer,
073            ExecutableElement method,
074            DocTree inheritDoc,
075            boolean isFirstSentence) {
076        Content replacement = writer.getOutputInstance();
077        BaseConfiguration configuration = writer.configuration();
078        Messages messages = configuration.getMessages();
079        Utils utils = configuration.utils;
080        CommentHelper ch = utils.getCommentHelper(method);
081        var path = ch.getDocTreePath(inheritDoc).getParentPath();
082        DocTree holderTag = path.getLeaf();
083        if (holderTag.getKind() == DocTree.Kind.DOC_COMMENT) {
084            try {
085                var docFinder = utils.docFinder();
086                Optional<Documentation> r = docFinder.trySearch(method,
087                    m -> Result.fromOptional(
088                        extractMainDescription(m, isFirstSentence, utils)))
089                    .toOptional();
090                if (r.isPresent()) {
091                    replacement
092                        = writer.commentTagsToOutput(r.get().method, null,
093                            r.get().mainDescription, isFirstSentence);
094                }
095            } catch (DocFinder.NoOverriddenMethodsFound e) {
096                String signature = utils.getSimpleName(method)
097                    + utils.flatSignature(method,
098                        writer.getCurrentPageElement());
099                messages.warning(method, "doclet.noInheritedDoc", signature);
100            }
101            return replacement;
102        }
103
104        Taglet taglet
105            = configuration.tagletManager.getTaglet(ch.getTagName(holderTag));
106        if (taglet != null && !(taglet instanceof InheritableTaglet)) {
107            // This tag does not support inheritance.
108            messages.warning(path, "doclet.inheritDocWithinInappropriateTag");
109            return replacement;
110        }
111
112        InheritableTaglet.Output inheritedDoc = ((InheritableTaglet) taglet)
113            .inherit(method, holderTag, isFirstSentence, configuration);
114        if (inheritedDoc.isValidInheritDocTag()) {
115            if (!inheritedDoc.inlineTags().isEmpty()) {
116                replacement = writer.commentTagsToOutput(inheritedDoc.holder(),
117                    inheritedDoc.holderTag(),
118                    inheritedDoc.inlineTags(), isFirstSentence);
119            }
120        } else {
121            String signature = utils.getSimpleName(method)
122                + utils.flatSignature(method, writer.getCurrentPageElement());
123            messages.warning(method, "doclet.noInheritedDoc", signature);
124        }
125        return replacement;
126    }
127
128    private record Documentation(List<? extends DocTree> mainDescription,
129            ExecutableElement method) {
130    }
131
132    private static Optional<Documentation> extractMainDescription(
133            ExecutableElement m,
134            boolean extractFirstSentenceOnly,
135            Utils utils) {
136        List<? extends DocTree> docTrees = extractFirstSentenceOnly
137            ? utils.getFirstSentenceTrees(m)
138            : utils.getFullBody(m);
139        return docTrees.isEmpty() ? Optional.empty()
140            : Optional.of(new Documentation(docTrees, m));
141    }
142
143    @Override
144    public Content getInlineTagOutput(Element e, DocTree inheritDoc,
145            TagletWriter tagletWriter) {
146        if (e.getKind() != ElementKind.METHOD) {
147            return tagletWriter.getOutputInstance();
148        }
149        return retrieveInheritedDocumentation(tagletWriter,
150            (ExecutableElement) e, inheritDoc, tagletWriter.isFirstSentence);
151    }
152}
